TopicTitle: KSP is The Humble Store's Daily Deal

Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/e908e6383f9f5f5912a73b3196f8fff3/tumblr_inline_niahnnVzFt1rr2wit.jpg"/></a></p>

<p>Kerbal Space Program is on sale as today’s daily deal at <a href="http://bit.ly/1mrNSDn"><strong>THE HUMBLE STORE</strong></a>! Don’t miss out on all the launches, hard landings and fun with funds. Get KSP for 40% off today!</p>
